verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: FLORENCE] — [ARGM-TMP: For the second time in two months] [ARG0: workers] [V: removed] [ARG1: downtown graffiti that contained a negative portrayal of President Donald Trump] .
FLORENCE — For the second time in two months workers removed [ARG0: downtown graffiti] [R-ARG0: that] [V: contained] [ARG1: a negative portrayal of President Donald Trump] .
